agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, March 5, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III HB 170 Bernal | et al. Relating to coverage for mammography under certain health benefit plans. HB 196 Stephenson Relating to allowing justice and municipal courts to access the financial responsibility verification program. HB 259 Thompson, Ed Relating to named driver insurance policies and certain related exclusions. HB 565 Coleman Relating to healthcare coverage in this state. HB 762 Wu Relating to HIV and AIDS tests and to health benefit plan coverage of HIV and AIDS tests. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
